reviewText:
The audio/soundtrack is bad - the camera work is bad shaky jerky -- in and out!

She loves to do scenes outside and in her sports car driving fast... I bought both DVD's and other DVD's of hers all at once boy did I get taken!

Interestingly enough... in all of her DVD's that I watched all of her alleged clientele were men... no women... maybe that is why she did not return any of my calls... I am the wrong sex.

You cannot hear her clearly and sometimes not at all in her outdoor scenes... terrible.

She jumps around in her presentation... no scripting whatsoever.  Poor... pooor ... pooooor

She encourages you to contact her and when you do she Never answers her phones [called several different times and on 2 or 3 different days] nor does she return your phone messages.

To me that is exemplary of a person who is just out to 'Knock-Off' some quick big bucks.  Someone who is misrepresenting themselves to be an ethical/professional who cars about others.  If that was the truth... her films would be professional at all levels and... she would be answering her phone.

Most of all she would be returning messages... especially after encouraging her viewers to call!

After wasting my money on her ... I found much better here on Amazon...
This is one of the worst videos that I have ever seen.  And not just hypnosis.  Not helpful and seems to communicate at the fifth grade level.
